Name: Le Traite des Pyrenees (The Treaty of the Pyrenees)
Ingredients: 10 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: SMOKE the inside of glass with a lightly fragrant cigar and cover. STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into cigar smoked glass.
Review: Rich and flavoursome Pedro Ximénez sherry stirred with cognac bitters and delicately influenced by cigar smoke
History: Created in 2015 by Johan Tufvesson at Kosmopol Bar, London, England. Johan’s original recipe calls for Martell XO cognac.
Nutrition: One serving of Le Traite des Pyrenees (The Treaty of the Pyrenees) contains 113 calories
